description:
The classic Norrøna zip-off Pants are versatile, breathable, and functional trekking pants with a flexible zip-off solution perfect for any outdoor adventure. The comfy pants are made in durable, lightweight recycled nylon with a cotton-like look, perfect for nature endeavors and downtime in between. The classic fit makes it suitable for a variety of activities, and the minimalistic look lets it slide perfectly into your daily outfit. In a few easy zips, you can transform the pants into your favorite trekking shorts– and vice versa.

Functional features include spacious pockets, two roomy hand warming pockets, two back pockets, belt loops, articulated knee construction for optimal mobility, and bottom leg hem with boot hooks and strap adjustments for easy custom- ization. They have a zipped front fly with snap waist closure.
name: Norrona Norrona Zip-Off Pants - Mens
